abstract: Countless celebrities attend HBO's Emmys after-party at Pacific Design Center in West Hollywood, Calif; HBO won 14 Emmys, including multiple wins for drama Game of Thrones and comedy series Veep.
lead_paragraph: Fire was the theme of its after-party, held outdoors at the Pacific Design Center in West Hollywood, Calif.

headline.print_headline: The Network, Like Its Party, Was Hot

snippet: Fire was the theme of its after-party, held outdoors at the Pacific Design Center in West Hollywood, Calif.
